Parcours.dec_name: Web and Mobile Application Development Techniques

Projects.desc_bcbg: Specialized commercial platform for custom kitchen and bathroom design, carried out by professional designers and builders
Projects.desc_tristan: Tristan Barbeau's real estate services promotional website offers special deals, consultations, and financing options for property acquisition.
Projects.desc_survie: Benoit Survivalist's personal blog, dedicated to survival and human autonomy, offers a variety of articles, videos, and also provides the opportunity to subscribe to exclusive training.
Projects.desc_winenot: An online wine cellar management electronic application, connected to the SAQ, allowing users to add, remove, label their favorite wines, track the status of their bottles, and easily access their collection with just a few clicks, anytime.
